Game.Name: Need for Speed Carbon - Own the City (USA, Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
Game.plot: Overview:Need for Speed: Carbon - Own the City is the portable version of Need for Speed: Carbon with the lead platform for Own the City being the PSP. Unlike Need for Speed Carbon on consoles, the Touge-style canyon racing is not included.Story:The game is set in fictional city named Coast City. After a street race that resulted in your brothers death you set out to find who caused it. With the help of a few friends you race to take over the city and find out the one behind it.PSNNeed for Speed Carbon Own the City is listed on PSN USA as simply "Need for Speed: Carbon". The "Own the City" part of the name is omitted, even though the thumbnail shows the full name.Need for Speed Carbon Own the City can be purchased from PSN USA for $19.99 and the filesize is listed as 810 MB.The game is supported by Playstation Vita according to the cheapassgamer.com forum community.
Game.Notes: Need for Speed Carbon delivers the next generation of adrenaline-filled street racing as players face the ultimate test of driving skill on treacherous canyon roads. What starts in the city is settled in the canyons as Need for Speed Carbon immerses you into the world's most dangerous and adrenaline-filled form of street racing. You and your crew must race in an all-out war for the city, risking everything to take over your rivals' neighbourhoods one block at a time.
